letters.description: Identify the client's unique neuro-biological presentation and specific executive function challenges.
Identify innate talents, dopamine triggers, and areas of hyperfocus to drive motivation.
Design external scaffolding and modify the physical or digital space to reduce cognitive load.
Utilize micro-tasking and activation strategies to overcome task paralysis and executive dysfunction.
Develop emotional regulation tools to manage rejection sensitivity and build self-compassion.
Establish sustainable, neuro-affirming routines that foster long-term independence and confidence.
